    • 方法详细资料

      • getQuakes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Quake> getQuakes​(java.lang.String fromDay,
                                            java.lang.String toDay,
                                            float magnitude,
                                            java.lang.String region)
        参数:
        fromDay - the start day
        toDay - the end day
        magnitude - earthquake magnitude
        region - region
        返回:
        quake list

      • getRegions

        public java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> getRegions​()
        A method used to get region list
        返回:
        a list contains all regions

      • getMaxDate

        public java.lang.String getMaxDate​()
        This method can get the latest Date in the database
        返回:
        maxDate

      • insertQuake

        public void insertQuake​(int id,
                        java.lang.String date,
                        float latitude,
                        float longitude,
                        int depth,
                        float magnitude,
                        java.lang.String region,
                        int area_id)
        A method used to insert quake into database (robust check is realized)
        参数:
        id - : An int ID of earthquake
        date - : An String contains the date it took place
        latitude - : A Latitude class about the latitude
        longitude - : A Longitude class about the longitude
        depth - : The depth of the earthquake
        magnitude - : The magnitude
        region - : A String of region
        area_id - : The ID of area in the database
